meanings: 법률 local employment promotion support fund, local employment promotion subsidy

vlive.korean: [지원금 없이 100만 뷰?] [Without any support?] View video Hyomstore : ep.7 제품선정 완료! MD들의 바이럴영상 도전기!
그런데 지원금은 없어. There is no funding. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [긍정이 체질] 1화 - 나도 이제 영화감독이다!!!
아니, 지원작으로 뽑혔는데 지원금이 없다는 게 그게 말이 맞나? We were chosen to receive funding, but there's no funding? 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [긍정이 체질] 1화 - 나도 이제 영화감독이다!!!
vlive.english: We were chosen to receive funding, but there's no funding?

vlive.korean: 작년까지 유지되던 지원금이 통보도 없이 사라지다니요? How can the grant just disappear when it was fine last year? 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [긍정이 체질] 1화 - 나도 이제 영화감독이다!!!
vlive.english: How can the grant just disappear when it was fine last year?

vlive.korean: 엄청 신기하네. - 이제 약속대로 지원금 받아 주시죠. That's impressive. - Now, collect the funding like you promised. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [긍정이 체질] 3화
vlive.english: That's impressive. - Now, collect the funding like you promised.

examples.korean: Japan has pledged $100 million in humanitarian aid. 발음듣기 일본이 인도주의적 지원금으로 1억 달러를 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Japan has pledged $100 million in humanitarian aid. 발음

examples.korean: Some $10 million in aid was funnelled into the country through government agencies. 발음듣기 약 천만 달러의 지원금이 정부 기관들을 통해 그 나라로 전달되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some $10 million in aid was funnelled into the country through government agencies. 발음

examples.korean: The infant care support fund is throwing childbearing women a lifeline. 발음듣기 육아지원금은 출산 여성들을 돕는 정책이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The infant care support fund is throwing childbearing women a lifeline. 발음

examples.korean: Soforthilfe for small businesses 발음듣기 자영업자를 위한 즉시 지원금 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전

"We consider injecting the remaining amount is better, but the plan may be scrapped if protests continue," he said at the National Assembly audit of state-run banks at the Industrial Bank of Korea headquarters in Seoul. 발음듣기 그는 서울 기업은행 본사에서 열린 국책은행 국정감사에서 "남은 액수의 지원금을 투입하는 게 더 낫다고 생각하지만, 시위가 계속된다면 이를 폐기할 수도 있다"고 말했다. The Korea Times
examples.english: "We consider injecting the remaining amount is better, but the plan may be scrapped if protests continue," he said at the National Assembly audit of state-run banks at the Industrial Bank of Korea headquarters in Seoul. 발음
